name: white-leather-obsidian-defs
description: Complete defs block for White Leather Ã— Obsidian Luxe theme - copy directly into SVG
usage: Copy the 'defsBlock' value directly into your SVG as the first child element
defsBlock: <defs id="definitions"><linearGradient id="bgGradient" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#ffffff"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#f0ece4"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="rubyGem" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#e74c5e"/><stop offset="50%" stop-color="#c21f32"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#8d1424"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="emeraldGem" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#2dd4bf"/><stop offset="50%" stop-color="#1a8f4d"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#0f5f33"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="sapphireGem" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#60a5fa"/><stop offset="50%" stop-color="#1e5aad"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#123a74"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="obsidianFrame" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#1a1f2e"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#0a0d14"/></linearGradient><linearGradient id="brushedMetal" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%"><stop offset="0%" stop-color="#e5e1d7"/><stop offset="25%" stop-color="#d8cba9"/><stop offset="50%" stop-color="#e5e1d7"/><stop offset="75%" stop-color="#d8cba9"/><stop offset="100%" stop-color="#e5e1d7"/></linearGradient><filter id="dropShadow" x="-20%" y="-20%" width="140%" height="140%"><feOffset dx="0" dy="4" in="SourceAlpha" result="shadowOffset"/><feGaussianBlur in="shadowOffset" result="shadowBlur" stdDeviation="8"/><feBlend in="SourceGraphic" in2="shadowBlur" mode="normal"/></filter><filter id="gemGlow" x="-50%" y="-50%" width="200%" height="200%"><feGaussianBlur in="SourceGraphic" result="blur" stdDeviation="3"/><feComposite in="blur" in2="SourceGraphic" operator="over"/></filter></defs>

rubyGem.purpose: Ruby gemstone buttons - results, destructive actions

sapphireGem.purpose: Sapphire gemstone buttons - primary, start actions

dropShadow.purpose: Soft shadow for panels and node frames

gemstoneButton.template: <g id="{{id}}" transform="translate({{x}}, {{y}})"><rect fill="#1a1f2e" width="{{width}}" height="{{height}}" rx="8" stroke="#d8cba9" stroke-width="2"/><rect fill="url(#{{gem}}Gem)" filter="url(#gemGlow)" width="{{innerWidth}}" height="{{innerHeight}}" x="7" y="7" rx="5"/><text fill="#ffffff" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="13" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" x="{{textX}}" y="{{textY}}">{{label}}</text></g>

decisionNode.description: Tree node with shadow and gem fill
decisionNode.template: <g transform="translate({{x}}, {{y}})"><rect fill="#1a1f2e" filter="url(#dropShadow)" width="{{width}}" height="{{height}}" rx="10" stroke="#d8cba9" stroke-width="3"/><rect fill="url(#{{gem}}Gem)" filter="url(#gemGlow)" width="{{innerWidth}}" height="{{innerHeight}}" x="7" y="7" rx="6"/><text fill="#ffffff" font-family="Arial, sans-serif" font-size="14" font-weight="bold" text-anchor="middle" x="{{textX}}" y="{{textY}}">{{label}}</text></g>

curvedEdge.description: Bezier curve connecting parent to child
